page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content: One of the most important industries in Rosedale is TOURISM. Many of the houses and farms offer Bed and Breakfast at approximately Â£7.oo.per person per night.Some also offer an Evening Meal. {The Milburn Arms Hotel}has 7 letting bedrooms, a large bar, Function room, and Dining Room which will seat 40. {The White Horse Farm Hotel}has 23 letting bedrooms with large bar and Dining Room. {The Rosedale Caravan and Camping Site has static caravans, touring caravans and tents.Facilities include toilets,showers,washroom,laundry room and general shop. {The Coach House}is a licenced Restaurant specialising in Peruvian Food. There is a small{Pitch & Putt 9 hole {Golf Course}at Red House.
